text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Huff…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, Taishin! Come on, let's train!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We promised to race in the Derby! So I really think it'd be cool to 
train together for it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Huff…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heeey! You listening?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh! Quit bothering me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I told you I don't need you to worry about me! I'm all good, so just 
focus on your own races! Dummy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaagh! She called me a dummyyy!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I can picture it clearly. Were you pestering her?

We're all here after Winning Ticket calls an emergency meeting on 
how to help Narita Taishin following her loss.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I reeeally wanted to make her feel better! Because I wanna race in 
the Derby together!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You don't need to explain—I understand what you were thinking. 
Naturally, Taishin does as well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whaaa… You really think she gets it? Even though she called me a 
dummy?

As Biwa Hayahide says, Narita Taishin knows that Winning Ticket 
wants to race in the Derby together.

And her brushing off Winning Ticket's attempts must mean one 
thing…
choice_data_list:
She pushed you away because she wants to race 
together too.

She pushed you away because she wants to race 
together too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's precisely it. We're all rivals who promised to race in the 
Derby together.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Rivals on the track, besties off it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Then you understand that cooperating isn't everything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uuuh… Uuuuummm… Actually, not really!

Rice Shower was trying to catch up to Mihono Bourbon forever… until 
she finally beat her in the Kikuka Sho.

So you don't always have to run by your rivals' side. Sometimes 
running ahead can motivate them too.

So you don't always have to run by your rivals' side. Sometimes 
running ahead can motivate them too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Run… ahead…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Seeing you win after consecutive races was rousing for both me and 
Taishin.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: No words need be spoken. Just keep running ahead.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I get it… Taishin doesn't want us to slow down. She's trying hard to run with us!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Okay! I'm gonna run like crazy! I'll go nonstop 'cause I know Taishin'll 
catch up!

Later at night, the sound of swift footsteps can be heard on the 
training course.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Huff…

Winning Ticket is training on her own to be able to run ahead of her 
rivals.

As I look on at the dedicated racer, a second, and then a third set of 
footsteps join in.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Huff…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Huff…

They didn't plan to meet here. It happened by chance because they 
each felt the same thing at the same time.

Without a word, the three continue running. But their overlapping 
footsteps sound like a fiery exchange between rivals.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Sigh… Students using the training course after hours is a no-no. What to do?
choice_data_list: Would you mind overlooking it this one time?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Hehe, if I must. I insist you look after them though.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I wouldn't dream of getting in the way during this important time in 
their lives. ♪

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hmph… Huff, puff, huff…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh! Huff, huff, huff…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah! Rrrnnngh!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ngh! Hraaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hey! Hwaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff, puff…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: What're you running so seriously for?! Dummy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You were running serious first! Actually, Hayahide started it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Because Taishin overtook me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Did not! Ticket was the one who shot off first!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Don't lie! Grrr!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pft… Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey, why'd you turn the other way? Are you laughing?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Heh-heh… Hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… Ahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I wonder if the sky will be this clear on the day of the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Geez… All you ever think about is the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's the big race I've always dreamed of running. It brings 
together everyone who shares the same dream.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone there pushes themselves to the limit through the entire 
2,400 meters—all to get the greatest glory there is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Just watching it gets my heart going… I wanna get out there on that 
turf and win it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I… have someone I want to beat as much as I want to defeat you two. 
And I have to get better to do it.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
How I see it, a Derby win won't only give me renown, but it will also 
act as proof of my abilities. Thus, I will accept nothing less than 
victory.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
As for me, people have been expecting me to fail since before I even 
got into the academy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I haven't been getting the wins, so it's not crazy for them to think 
that, but it sucks being known for it. It makes me fed up with myself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So I wanna show them. I'll win the Derby and prove I'm not a 
weakling.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then let's run together! Because all of us wanna win the Derby no 
matter what!
